title: Report Facility Safety Hazard
description: A staff member reports a large water spill on the floor of a main hallway, creating a slip hazard.

tasks.description: Gather the exact location of the hazard.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the building and floor number.

tasks.description: Create a high-priority cleanup request for the custodial services team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates an urgent work order.

tasks.description: Contact campus safety to secure the area with warning signs until custodial arrives.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent dispatches security to prevent accidents.
